NDSI_Snow_Cover.name: Gridded NDSI snow cover and data flag values.

NDSI_Snow_Cover_Basic_QA.name: A general estimate of the quality of the algorithm result.

NDSI_Snow_Cover_Algorithm_Flags_QA.name: Algorithm-specific bit flags set for data screens and for inland water.

NDSI.name: Raw NDSI values (i.e. prior to screening).

Snow_Albedo_Daily_Tile.name: Daily snow albedo corresponding to the NDSI_Snow_Cover parameter.

orbit_pnt.name: Pointer to the orbit of the swath mapped into each grid cell. For details, see Section 1.1.2 below.

granule_pnt.name: Pointer for identifying the swath mapped into each grid cell. For details, see the section 'Using the granule_pnt' below.
